column4: I am running dual monitors and have some flash issues: When going full screen, Flash Videos open on monitor A with resolution of Monitor B. Is there any way to have them use the appropriate resolution for the appropriate monitor
It's Flash, nothing you can do, it's buggy
Wait for Adobe to fix it, unlikely though
I have no clue about arch =)
its just the only clue I could find so far
I got sound to work in wine using "padsp" before

I'm just reading on a forum about padsp, and it seems I also need to use it on winecfg, but I dont know where to put it... I just type padsp winecfg in a terminal? or will that just run another instance of it?
putting it in the launcher alone didnt work
nope, still no result :( the only thing that worked so far was disabling pulse by doing killall pulseaudio and then editing etc/pulse to disable autolaunch, but that causes a lot of other problems
I also tried switching to OSS Sound
Oh... Well, sad... I don't think I could help more than that. Well I tried.
There is a virtual character map preinstalled, gucharmap
